results.title: Mayberry RFD
results.overview: Sam brings over one of his Italian friends from the war--but unbenowst to him the friend brings over his elderly father and sister--and this creates mayhem in his family and business.

results.title: A Girl for Goober
results.overview: Sam and Andy call on modern technology to finally get Goober a steady girl.

results.title: Opie and Mike
results.overview: Opie helps Mike learn how to deal with a bully at school.

results.title: Sam for Town Council
results.overview: Sam runs against Emmett for office.

results.title: The Wedding
results.overview: Thanks to his mother's sudden and unexpected wedding, Howard is at long last on his own!

results.title: Emmett's Anniversary
results.overview: It's Emmet's 25th wedding anniversary and his intentions outweigh his bank account!

results.title: Helen's Past
results.overview: As Andy is looking through Helen's old newspaper clippings, he finds one of her being taken to jail by the police.  He decides to keep his discovery secret until it leaks out to the school board which could destroy Helen's teaching career.

results.title: Aunt Bee's Big Moment
results.overview: Aunt Bee takes flying lessons, but doesn't feel ready to fly solo.

results.title: Goober Goes to the Auto Show
results.original_title: Goober Goes to the Auto Show
results.overview: An old friend makes Goober feel worthless.

results.title: Barney Hosts a Summit Meeting
results.overview: An international summit is in the hands of Barney.

results.title: The Church Benefactors
results.overview: A $500 donation to the church causes conflict.

results.title: Opie's Drugstore Job
results.overview: Opie gets a job working at the drugstore and learns that everyone makes mistakes.

results.title: Emmett's Brother-In-Law
results.overview: In order to increase his income, Emmett closes his beloved fix-it shop and starts selling insurance.

results.title: The Mayberry Chef
results.overview: Aunt Bee hosts a cooking show, but Andy and Opie suffer at suppertime.

results.title: Goober The Executive
results.overview: Goober buys the gas station with financial backing from Andy and Emmett.

results.title: Howard's New Life
results.overview: Howard quits his boring job as county clerk and becomes a Caribbean island beachcomber.

results.title: Andy Gets Sick
results.overview: Andy catches the flu and Goober takes over as his deputy.

results.title: Aunt Bee's Cousin
results.overview: Andy learns the truth when he sees his cousin Bradford alight from a freight train but keeps quiet because Aunt Bee thinks he's a wealthy relative.

results.title: Howard and Millie
results.overview: Howard proposes to Millie at the bakery where she works.

results.title: Andy's Investment
results.overview: Andy opens a coin laundry to save money for Opie's college education.

results.title: Aunt Bee And The Lecturer
results.overview: A visiting professor is attracted to Aunt Bee because she resembles his deceased wife.

results.title: Opie's Group
results.overview: Opie joins a rock-and-roll group and starts getting failing grades in school.

results.title: Tape Recorder
results.overview: Opie and Arnold record a prisoner telling the whereabouts of the money from a bank robbery.

results.title: Aunt Bee, The Juror
results.overview: Aunt Bee, summoned for jury duty, disagrees with fellow jurors on her first case.

results.title: Howard's Main Event
results.overview: Howard, dating Millie, is threatened by her husky former boyfriend
